name: 研究方法與論文寫作
description: Familiarity with academic writing and research methods can be as important to one’s success as expertise in the discipline itself. A graduate student like you will want to be able to perform a variety of research methods and writing tasks such as research papers and theses. This course provides you with an opportunity to practice the research methods and writing conventions of academics in the disciplines of Translation & Interpretation Studies.  	After taking this course, you will be expected: (1)	to gather information about academic writing conventions in your research area, (2)	to analyze the structure and discourse conventions of numerous written products,  (3)	to practice writing for academic genres, (4)	to become familiar with the types of research methods typically used in the study of Translation and Interpretation.

syllabus:
Familiarity with academic writing and research methods can be as important to one’s success as expertise in the discipline itself. A graduate student like you will want to be able to perform a variety of research methods and writing tasks such as research papers and theses. This course provides you with an opportunity to practice the research methods and writing conventions of academics in the disciplines of Translation & Interpretation Studies. After taking this course, you will be expected: (1) to gather information about academic writing conventions in your research area, (2) to analyze the structure and discourse conventions of numerous written products, (3) to practice writing for academic genres, (4) to become familiar with the types of research methods typically used in the study of Translation and Interpretation.

英語學術寫作輔導：本校英語學術素養中心提供學生端的學習支援，以協助同學解決英語學術寫作上的困難。本中心延攬各學科專業領域優秀博碩士生擔任寫作輔導員，透過一對一輔導，針對同學的英文論文、報告、申論題、心得、和作業等提供寫作諮詢建議，並針對其草稿或初步構想進行討論。但不提供翻譯、逐字修訂、校對、潤飾等服務。有興趣的學生可以前往中心網站查閱詳情與預約諮詢時段（[bit.ly/calwriting](http://bit.ly/calwriting)）。
